item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven and the nearby area.

This week's location is: Christopher Martin's

We haven't been to CM's in a while.  It's a great neighborhood bar with good food, nice selection of drinks, and I've always had a great bartender or waitress/waiter whenever I've visited. They are just all-around good people there : )

I spoke to Brian at Christopher Martin's and he said that he would have a happy hour buffet, and replenish it as long as the collective was there (so come early and stay late!).  He's also offering 2-4-1 for the FIRST drink (so one free drink) and their usual happy hour prices on drinks (50 cents off domestic bottles and well drinks and 25 cents off top shelf.)  They have a whole computer set up process for pricing for happy hour, and unfortunatly they can only offer us special pricing on drinks until 7pm without changing the computer....but hey, at least we get a free drink. That's awesome in my book!  Let's give them a good showing for being so nice to us.

http://www.christophermartins.com/

P.S. As some of you may know, Meetup does charge the Leadership twice a year for hosting the website.  We do not pass this fee along in any mandatory way, however we will be bringing a collection jar along to the next few functions and anything you can give towards defraying this cost to keeping the group going will be appreciated!  Thanks!

PLEASE RSVP

If you are a "Maybe", please RSVP as "YES" and indicate MAYBE in the comments.

Your contact is devorah; number in RSVP.

ome early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend**
item.how_to_find_us: We are usually the Largest group at the bar on a Monday. If that does not work, feel free to call the contact/host listed in the description.
